select * from (select rownum rnum , a.*, count(*) over() as cnt from ( select * from (select b.*, rownum numbering from tb_free_board b where study_no = #{studyNum} order by reg_date)
and email like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

order by notice asc,
reg_date desc,
see_cnt desc,
num desc) a) where rnum between #{begin} and #{end}
